title: L&T carves out renewable business to meet growing global demand
description: Larsen & Toubro (L&T) has launched a new Renewable EPC business vertical, separating it from its Power Transmission & Distribution unit. This move aims to improve management and resource integration as global and regional opportunities in renewable energy, particularly in solar and wind, continue to grow rapidly. Effective September 1.
